title: the Aquatic Paladin
intro: When the Primordial Dragon fell, its soul was shattered into six fragments of avatars that would later be referred to as the Dragon Knights, or the Draconis siblings. Marinus is the fourth sibling, wielding the elemental power of water. She commands the crushing weight of the ocean to drown her enemies, eventually ascending into a draconic form of living water to obliterate those who stand in her way.

abilities.name: Abyssal Depth
abilities.details: Marinus gains bonus [ap]magic penetration[/] based on her [mp]maximum mana[/]. A percentage of Marinus's bonus [ap]magical power[/] is converted into [mp]maximum mana[/].

abilities.name: Hydro Pump
abilities.details:
Marinus channels a high-pressure beam of water in a straight line that impacts the first enemy hit, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mp]maximum mana[/]) every 0.25 seconds.

While casting, Marinus is [db]grounded[/] (cannot move) but can rotate her direction. This ability can be held down to continue the blast, rapidly consuming her [mp]mana[/] per second.

In Aqua Dragon form, the beam becomes a powerful torrent, gaining extra range and dealing additional bonus magical damage based on the target's [db]maximum health (scaling with [mp]maximum mana[/]).

abilities.name: Riptide Vortex
abilities.details:
Marinus creates a swirling vortex at a target location. After a short delay, the vortex deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mp]maximum mana[/]) per second and constantly [db]pulls[/] them toward its center.

In Aqua Dragon form, the vortex is larger and enemies will also be [db]grounded[/] (preventing them from dashing).

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.details:
Marinus sends a crashing tidal wave in a target direction, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mp]maximum mana[/]) to all enemies hit and [db]slowing[/] them for a short duration.

In Aqua Dragon form, the wave is significantly [db]wider[/] and also [db]knocks up[/] enemies instead of slowing them.

abilities.name: Ocean Breaker
abilities.details:
Marinus surges with primal energy, transforming into the Aqua Dragon for a duration, gaining increased [bf]size[/], [mp]maximum mana[/] and [mp]mana regen[/].

In addition, Ocean Breaker also [bf]recovers[/] a percentage of her maximum mana on cast.

While in Aqua Dragon form, her abilities are enhanced.
